DataStax OpsCenter Developer -- REMOTE

https://hire.jobvite.com/j?cj=oVGf0fwA&s=Hacker_News:_Matt

DataStax is the fastest, most scalable distributed database technology, delivering Apache Cassandra to the worldâ€™s most innovative enterprises. We are looking for a talented full-stack Developer to work on the OpsCenter - DSE (Monitoring team). This position will be located anywhere in the US.

The OpsCenter codebase currently consists of Python, Clojure, and JavaScript. Familiarity with one or more of these is important, but even more important is the passion and ability to work on any part of an application and ability to learn and adapt quickly as the application and technologies underneath evolve. Of course, bonus points for experience with any of Cassandra, Spark, Hadoop, or Solr.
